content: Yunguo just grew her first batch of potatoes! So, Glenn's stocked up on <style=Highlight>potato seeds</style>. Here, these are for you.
info: 星球树土豆种子-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: {A抱歉}<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, hold on... Our planet can now sustain more arable land for crops, and a wider variety of crops can be cultivated, too.
info: 星球树土豆种子-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: By planting more varieties of crops, you'll be able to cook a wider range of dishes, hoho! If you need anything else, feel free to ask me anytime.
info: 星球树土豆种子-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本3
